text: Results are expressed as the mean +/- SEM .
Statistical significance between groups was assessed using two-way ANOVA .
The differences for in vivo experiments ( at least 5 mice per group ) were calculated using the Mann-Whitney U-test for unpaired data .
Statistical significance of differences between survival rates was analyzed by comparing Kaplan-Meier curves using the log-rank test ( GraphPad Prism version 5 , GraphPad , San Diego , CA ) .
